graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' ProtectionStatus in (0,1)
|columns serverHost, MountPoint, timestamp, rsoTaskId, ProtectionStatus, EncryptionPercentage
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' ProtectionStatus in (0,1)
| columns timestamp, serverHost, rsoTaskId
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost
| filter ProtectionStatus != 1
| let EncryptionStatus= EncryptionPercentage=0 ? "unprotected" : (EncryptionPercentage > 0 && EncryptionPercentage <100) ? "partially protected" : "protected"
| sort -timestamp
| columns serverHost, MountPoint, EncryptionStatus
graphs.title: Bitlocker Partitions not encrypted

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' ProtectionStatus in (0,1)
|columns serverHost, serverIP, MountPoint, timestamp, rsoTaskId, ProtectionStatus, EncryptionPercentage
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' ProtectionStatus in (0,1)
| columns timestamp, serverHost, rsoTaskId
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost

| let EncryptionStatus= EncryptionPercentage=0 ? "unprotected" : (EncryptionPercentage > 0 && EncryptionPercentage <100) ? "partially protected" : "protected"
| sort -timestamp
| group count(EncryptionStatus) by EncryptionStatus
graphs.title: EncryptionStatus

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' ServiceType != null 
| columns serverHost, DisplayName, PathName, StartMode, StartName, State, SystemName, rsoTaskId
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' ServiceType != null 
| columns timestamp, serverHost, rsoTaskId
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost
| columns SystemName, DisplayName, PathName, StartMode, StartMode, StartName, State
graphs.title: Services

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' ServiceType != null 
| columns serverHost , DisplayName, PathName, rsoTaskId
)
,
(
rsoTaskId > '0' ServiceType != null 
| columns DisplayName, rsoTaskId
| group NumberOfOccurence=count(DisplayName), rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by DisplayName
| filter NumberOfOccurence < 2
)
on DisplayName, rsoTaskId 
| columns serverHost , DisplayName, PathName
| sort DisplayName, serverHost
graphs.title: Unique Services in Environment

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' DriverVersion != null 
| columns serverHost, DriverProviderName, InfName, FriendlyName, rsoTaskId
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' DriverVersion != null 
| columns timestamp, serverHost, rsoTaskId
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost
| columns serverHost, DriverProviderName, InfName, FriendlyName
| filter DriverProviderName != null InfName != null
graphs.title: PnP Device Drivers

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' DirectoryName != null 
| columns serverHost, DirectoryName, FullName, Name, rsoTaskId
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' DirectoryName != null 
| columns rsoTaskId, serverHost
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost
| columns serverHost, DirectoryName, FullName, Name, rsoTaskId
| group NumberOfOccurences=count(serverHost) by serverHost, Name
graphs.title: Occurences by Endpoints (from last run)

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' DirectoryName != null 
| columns serverHost, DirectoryName, FullName, Name, rsoTaskId
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' DirectoryName != null 
| columns rsoTaskId, serverHost
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost
| columns serverHost, FullName, rsoTaskId
graphs.title: Occurences  (from last run)

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' DirectoryName != null 
| columns timestamp, serverHost, DirectoryName, FullName, Name, rsoTaskId
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' DirectoryName != null 
| group Occurence=estimate_distinct(FullName), rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
| columns rsoTaskId, serverHost
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' DirectoryName != null 
| group All_Occurences=count(FullName) by serverHost, rsoTaskId 
| columns rsoTaskId, serverHost, All_Occurences
)
on serverHost, rsoTaskId 
| columns serverHost, FullName, DirectoryName, Name, All_Occurences
| sort -All_Occurences
graphs.title: All Occurences by Endpoint, DirectoryName and FileName

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' TaskName != null 
| columns serverHost , TaskName, TaskPath, rsoTaskId
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' TaskName != null 
| columns timestamp, serverHost, rsoTaskId
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost
| columns serverHost , TaskName, TaskPath
graphs.title: All Scheduled Tasks

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' TaskName != null 
| columns serverHost , TaskName, TaskPath, rsoTaskId
)
,
(
rsoTaskId > '0' TaskName != null 
| columns TaskName, TaskPath, rsoTaskId
| group NumberOfOccurence=count(TaskName), rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by TaskName
| filter NumberOfOccurence < 2
)
on TaskName, rsoTaskId 
| columns serverHost , TaskName
graphs.title: Unique Tasks in Environment

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' Key != null 
| columns serverHost , Key, Value, rsoTaskId
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' Key != null 
| columns timestamp, serverHost, rsoTaskId
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost
| columns serverHost , Key, Value
graphs.title: Environment Variables

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' PackageName != null 
| columns serverHost, Vendor, Name, Version, rsoTaskId
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' PackageName != null
| columns timestamp, serverHost, rsoTaskId
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost
| columns serverHost, Vendor, Name, Version
graphs.title: Applications in Scope

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' PackageName != null 
| columns Vendor, Name, Version
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' PackageName != null 
| columns Vendor, Name, Version, rsoTaskId, serverHost
| group NumberOfOccurence=count(Name), rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by Vendor, Name, Version
)
on Vendor, Name, Version
| columns Vendor, Name, Version, AppCount=NumberOfOccurence 
| sort -AppCount
| group count(AppCount) by Vendor, Name, Version
| sort Vendor, Name, Version
graphs.title: Apps by Vendor, Name and Version

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' RemoteAddress != null 
| columns serverHost, LocalAddress, LocalPort, RemoteAddress, RemotePort, rsoTaskId, State
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' RemoteAddress != null 
| columns rsoTaskId, serverHost
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost
| filter State=2
| columns serverHost, LocalAddress, LocalPort, RemoteAddress, RemotePort, ConnState='Listen'
graphs.title: Listening Ports (inbound)

graphs.query:
| join 
(rsoTaskId > '0' RemoteAddress != null 
| columns serverHost, LocalAddress, LocalPort, RemoteAddress, RemotePort, rsoTaskId, State
),
(rsoTaskId > '0' RemoteAddress != null 
| columns rsoTaskId, serverHost
| group rsoTaskId=newest(rsoTaskId) by serverHost
)
on rsoTaskId, serverHost
| let TCPState=array('Closed','Listen','SynSent','SynReceived','Established','FinWait1','FinWait2','CloseWait','Closing','LastAck','TimeWait','DeleteTCB','Bound')
| filter State!=2  RemotePort>0
| columns serverHost, LocalAddress, LocalPort, RemoteAddress, RemotePort, ConnState=TCPState.get(State-1)
graphs.title: Connections

description:
Output from Datacollection scripts 
(shows only the data from the latest tasks run)
